plot: Eve, Flynn and Jenkins go to a party hosted by Santa Claus. In the meantime, Santa's Sleigh is left in the care of The Library. It also happens to be All Thanksthieving Day, celebrated by thieves all the world over. Ezekiel feels he needs to see his family of thieves to bring his adoptive mother a gift which happens not to be stolen. Once Ezekiel's mother finds out that Ezekiel has been leading a double life at the Library one thing leads to another, as his mother steals the magical world globe to do her own thefts and what ensues has The Librarians try to right what's wrong before consequences are final.—Movie Dude
